channel.title: Vanguard || Unique Content - Player Chosen || Frequent Updates || 100% Unique ||
channel.description:
[CENTER]
This thread will be continually updated. We ask you do not post negative comments. If you do not wish to play, that's fine, but there's no need for negativity. We hope to see you soon!
[URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.com/"][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ezygg.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Links[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SIZE=3]Home[/SIZE]: [url=http://vanguardrsps.com/]Vanguard[/url] [SIZE=3]Upcoming updates[/SIZE]: [url=http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/topic/101-updates-to-expect/#entry197]Updates[/url] [SIZE=3]Updates[/SIZE]: [url=http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/forum/5-updates/]Change log[/url]
[B][U][SIZE=4]We are seeking[/SIZE][/U][/B]
Support members Moderators + PR team members
[B][U][SIZE=4]Home Location[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SIZE=3]Home is located within the camelot party room, and I will explain why. I understand fully that this might be seen as a poor choice of home location, however, given the fact that we usually only have roughly 15 online, it suits are needs. Once the playerbase grows we are going to change the home to another area. [/SIZE]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SIZE=3]
[ul][*]Hiscores [*]Amazing voting reward [*]Amazing prices [*]NPC item gambling [*]Amazing IPB Forums, they really are beautiful [*]Task system minigame with rewards [*]Tons of PVM [*]Smooth PK [*]Fair & fun drop rates [*]Smooth bank tabs & Bank pin [*]50+ custom items with functionality [*]Player optional item syncs to keep prices high [*]Pets [*]Smooth, fully functional duel arena [*]Questing, with new quests added regularly, and real rewards [*]Full profitable skilling [*]Customizable completionist cape with requirements [*]Team jad [*]A hub on the forums that contains all server information [*]Godwars with minions [*]Black mask & Slayer helmet give bonus damage when fighting your task [*]Double XP amulet (Camulet). [*]Staking with failsafes[/ul]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Media - More being added[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkXIk/56262adb76.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkXLB/7a8a49f8ad.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkXQn/9582e43c8c.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkXSW/2c08e862c6.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkXVu/ed54668bd8.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkY1N/ff28ef09cd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkY7c/757babc13a.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkYcd/1ab3e10de4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkYi2/268af3ce31.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkYl1/58573b439f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkYqw/e55db07ab6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkYt6/5ab4c3eeca.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hkYze/47a5bca6b0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2elqdl2.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Feedback[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[QUOTE=Joonyer;4849995]Very good server! alot of updates coming the players we have are active and would love to get more players. great layout and all around awesome community[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Shire;4851634]hopped on, friendly community, good flow of updates, decent server. :yes:[/QUOTE]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Introduction[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SIZE=3]Welcome to Vanguard. Your bank is stocked full of gear and supplies. The shops contain essential items that are free, however some shops to require coins or certain points. We recommend starting your adventure at barrows, because they have a low drop rate of 1 in 10 (10%). You will have the ability to use the clan chat after you have played for 5 minutes. The green "player information" tab has all of the information regarding your account. The note tab, located in the bottom right, contains a list of commands. We recommend you also start by typing ::vote and completing the vote for 50m, 15 voting points, and 10 crystal keys. If you have any questions, our wonderful community would be happy to answer them in the clan chat.[/SIZE]
[/CENTER]
Credits: [URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/user/1-syntaxed/"]Syntaxed[/URL], [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/mgt+madness/"]Mgt madness[/URL]

item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“g0d of war1, post:10, topic:551398”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=670312.msg4483078#msg4483078 date=1431610173]

I guess I can see that, but tbh try my server. Ik we’re off to bad terms, but I’m doing alot to it, you’d be suprised what I’m doing. It’s not the average.

Yeah, you seem like a mature person to be around. I’m sure it reflects wonders within your ownership.

OT: Good luck with this, I like the looks of it. The home area looks cool.
[/quote] nolannnn! i smell your sarcasm :|[/quote]

Lol, someone got it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

It’s called log in, and vote and get your reward… Ohye I’m raging so hard, only kids say that shit idiot. + Welliton is always all over everyone’s shit with negativity. Like it helps the community or makes anyone wanna push forward and continue.

The advertisement thread is the first thing people will see when they are going to potentially try out a server. I was merely asking what these voting rewards entails. If I am to go by your logic, I am not allowed to ask these questions.

[quote=“FoHammer, post:10, topic:550904”]Lol… You’re still failing… Shouldn’t of removed me. ^^
Anyways I’m waiting for u to get a little bigger than I’m releasing your source fag. Thanks for fudgeing me over.[/quote]
You are going to make a great owner some day.

Read full topic

item.title: Vanguard || Unique Content - Player Chosen || Frequent Updates || 100% Unique ||
item.dc:creator: @CSharp95 CSharp95
item.description:
@CSharp95 wrote:

I will say the server is actually quite fun.
There have been some downtimes due to a bug, but I’ve been told it’s been fixed and so far it seems to be fine.

Not for you if you’re into economy. The vote reward alone is massive, and there have been drop parties, so if you’re looking for a server where you could slowly invest your time and gold into slowly getting better and better items, there’s none of that here. Almost every kind of food, potion and basic armor/weapon are free in the shops.

It is fun though, not in a hard working and building yourself up over time way, but in a “I feel like relaxing” kind of way. I quite enjoy logging on, talking to a few people, killing things for drops, and just enjoying having pretty much anything I want to do open to me. You don’t have to worry about spending weeks and weeks grinding to get higher-tier items just to loose it due to a rollback or a bug, since that’s happened to me quite often.

In fact, it seems relatively bug free. Ignoring the bug that caused disconnections and a couple misspellings I’ve seen, I haven’t really seen any bugs.

It’s worth playing, for sure.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vanguardrsps vanguardrsps
item.description:
@vanguardrsps wrote:

[CENTER]

This thread will be continually updated. We ask you do not post negative comments. If you do not wish to play, that’s fine, but there’s no need for negativity. We hope to see you soon!

[URL=http://“http://vanguardrsps.com/”][/URL]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Links[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[SIZE=3]Home[/SIZE]: Vanguard
[SIZE=3]Upcoming updates[/SIZE]: Updates
[SIZE=3]Updates[/SIZE]: Change log

[B][U][SIZE=4]We are seeking[/SIZE][/U][/B]

Support members
Moderators +
PR team members

[B][U][SIZE=4]Home Location[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[SIZE=3]Home is located within the camelot party room, and I will explain why. I understand fully that this might be seen as a poor choice of home location, however, given the fact that we usually only have roughly 15 online, it suits are needs. Once the playerbase grows we are going to change the home to another area. [/SIZE]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[SIZE=3]

[ul][]Hiscores
[]Amazing voting reward
[]Amazing prices
[]NPC item gambling
[]Amazing IPB Forums, they really are beautiful
[]Task system minigame with rewards
[]Tons of PVM
[]Smooth PK
[]Fair & fun drop rates
[]Smooth bank tabs & Bank pin
[]50+ custom items with functionality
[]Player optional item syncs to keep prices high
[]Pets
[]Smooth, fully functional duel arena
[]Questing, with new quests added regularly, and real rewards
[]Full profitable skilling
[]Customizable completionist cape with requirements
[]Team jad
[]A hub on the forums that contains all server information
[]Godwars with minions
[]Black mask & Slayer helmet give bonus damage when fighting your task
[]Double XP amulet (Camulet).
[*]Staking with failsafes[/ul]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Media - More being added[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SPOILER=Media]














[/SPOILER]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Feedback[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[QUOTE=Joonyer;4849995]Very good server! alot of updates coming the players we have are active and would love to get more players. great layout and all around awesome community[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Shire;4851634]hopped on, friendly community, good flow of updates, decent server. :yes:[/QUOTE]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Introduction[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[SIZE=3]Welcome to Vanguard. Your bank is stocked full of gear and supplies. The shops contain essential items that are free, however some shops to require coins or certain points. We recommend starting your adventure at barrows, because they have a low drop rate of 1 in 10 (10%). You will have the ability to use the clan chat after you have played for 5 minutes. The green “player information” tab has all of the information regarding your account. The note tab, located in the bottom right, contains a list of commands. We recommend you also start by typing ::vote and completing the vote for 50m, 15 voting points, and 10 crystal keys. If you have any questions, our wonderful community would be happy to answer them in the clan chat.[/SIZE]

[/CENTER]
